item.title: New Container: Doublecommander
item.description: We have released a new container for Doublecommander! Double Commander is a free cross platform open source file manager with two panels side by side. It is inspired by Total Commander and features some new ideas.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Doublecommander!

Double Commander is a free cross platform open source file manager with two panels side by side. It is inspired by Total Commander and features some new ideas.
